104a1(mdo sde): bgyid 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'jig par yang mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / stong pa nyid dang / na
104a2(mdo sde): mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur 'jig par yang mi 'gyur na/ de ci ltar na chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa la bud med kyi lus dor zhing skyes pa'i lus blang bar rus par
104a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba 'am/ mi blang ba'i phyir chos 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ yang 'jam dpal mig ni skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin/ de bzhin du
104a4(mdo sde): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yino zhes de bzhin gshegs pas ga sungs te/ chos gang skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin
104a5(mdo sde): pade ni 'byung ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// sgra sa pa sring mo khyod kyis/ ci srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyad / smras pa
104a6(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i skyes bus ci srid nas rnam par shes pa'o// smras pa sgyu ma'i skyes bu yod dpa/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir na de skad smra/ khyod ci bzod pa skyes sam smras pa de
104a7(mdo sde): me yin no// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir na 'chang bar byed/ smras pa sgyu ma'i skyes bus ci srid nas/ byang chutu sems bskyed pa de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sepas bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
104a8(mdo sde): dang chos thams sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ci srid nas khyed kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed ces de skad smras pa'i 'dri ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba ni
104b1(mdo sde): bskyed dang mi nus/ dgag par mi nus/ gdags par mi nus/ gang dgag tu med pa'i chos de ni skyed pa 'am dgag par mi nuso// smras pa tshul bzhin du 'dri ba ni gang / tshul de ni gang / smra
104b2(mdo sde): po mi skye ba ni tshul te/ de 'dra bar 'di 'dri ba na tshul bzhin du 'dri ba'o// yang sring mo khyod bzod pa skyes sam zhes de skad smra ba/ bdag ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma smras
104b3(mdo sde): pa yang ma lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir bskyed par yang ma lags/ 'bri ba yang ma lags so// de bas na bzod pa smos pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma skyes
104b4(mdo sde): yang ma lag so// sring ro byang chub sems dpas don gang gi dbang mthong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug/ smras pa 'jam dpal sems cad yongs su mya na
104b5(mdo sde): las bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi go ca bgo bar byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thang thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir
104b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas/ ma byon rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur
104b7(mdo sde): de ltar bzhugs pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo ba mi mdzad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i phyir// smras pa sring mo ci'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal
104b8(mdo sde): ri byang pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras pa ci'i phyir/ smras pa 'di la cung zad kyang byar med do// smras pa sring mo ci'i phyir ra rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dag
105a1(mdo sde): slong gi dngos por 'gyur/ smras pa mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// smras pa sring mo dmu zhig yid ches par gyur/ smras pa/ 
105a2(mdo sde): gang dag ye shes ma skyes pa mi 'jig pa'o// smras pa de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ smras pa gang ma mos pa'o// sring mi mos pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/ smras pa 'ja
105a3(mdo sde): dpal mos pa la ni rnam par grol ba'i yon tan mchis so// smras pa sring mo khyod thogs pa med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to// smras pa 'jam dpal dmigs pa las
105a4(mdo sde): spyod cig/ 'jam dpal gang du'ang chags pa yod dam ci na/ de ci'i phyar zhe na/ de'i phyir bdag la khyod ni mtho gas pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes smra/ smras pa de ma yin
105a5(mdo sde): nor de bas na bdag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de/ ci la spobs pa zhes bya/ smras pa gang
105a6(mdo sde): ngag gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do// smras pa gang du rdzogs/ smras pa gang du yang ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid
105a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal yang gang dag gis ma rtogs pa/ bdag gis rtogs pa'o// smras pa gang du ma rtogs
105a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang ga gi khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ni khong du ma chad pas rtogs so// smras pa sring mo khyod kyis ci srod nas/ byang chub mngon par
105b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa gang gi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa de'i tshe na/ bdag kyang
105b2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'jam dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ thob par nus sam/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang
105b3(mdo sde): mi smra bar gyur pa dang / sring mo des 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal cang mi smra bar bya ba dus la ma bab kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub ni bshang
105b4(mdo sde): du myong na/ de'i phyir ci bshad ma 'tshal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to
105b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'dra ba'i bstan par bgyi da / bgying pa ngo mtshar na/ bcom ldan 'das sring mo
105b6(mdo sde): 'dis yun ci srid nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ ci srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di sangs rgyas
105b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing ci lta bur 'gyur/ 'di'i ming cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo 'ongs byang chub kyi phyir spyad nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig
105b8(mdo sde): brgya phrag stong gi phrag dgu 'das pa dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyod // 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sring mo 'dis gang gi drung du byang chub tu sems bsku
106a1(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig byung
106a2(mdo sde): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed do// deri sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par gyur pa de dag/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skad
106a3(mdo sde): du bshad kyang / cha tsam yang bshad par mi 'gyur te/ sring mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa/ ci bud med du gyur pa lags sam/ bka' stsal ba/ de ni ma yin
106a4(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni de'i tshe de'i su na/ 'khor los sgyur bar rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'a ngi ni bud med ces mi bya/ skas pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// srid
106a5(mdo sde): mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tingange 'dzin thob pa ste/ de ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gis lus sprul par byed do// 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ro/ stong gsum gyi stong
106a6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang yal ga dang mdab ma ci snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
106a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu snang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi tshogs chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
106a8(mdo sde): zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkod mchog 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar gyur pa 'di yang de bzhin te/ lhag pa med chad pa med do// 
106b1(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon
106b2(mdo sde): dur gyur pa 'di ni bgyi ba yang ba bgyid pa mang ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtog par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ 
106b3(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin do// de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ba ste/ de dag ni chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i phyir bde ba zad par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi
106b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam khyod byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang martsod
106b5(mdo sde): gcig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spobs pa dang 'dri ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad na
106b6(mdo sde): bar sel ba mnyam par gzhag pa gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldan par byed pa'i ting 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhog pa de dag ming tsam yang khyod kyis ming sheso// de ras 'khor
106b7(mdo sde): de na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
106b8(mdo sde): bsngags par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems sems kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul
107a1(mdo sde): zhes byang la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi pa stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams na/ sems ca ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jas dpa' 'dra bar gyur
107a2(mdo sde): zin kyang / sring mo 'di'i ting 'dzin gyi mthu dang rnam par 'phral pa dang / cho 'phrul dang / ye shes kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phong ngo // ti nge 'dzin gang dag la sring po 'di mnyam par ga
107a3(mdo sde): dang ldan par byed pa'i ring 'jam dpal gyis ri she so// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ san ci snyed yod pa de dag thaMng tingange 'dzin gri mthu dang ya
107a4(mdo sde): shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas the tsor sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur tu zin kyang de dag thaMd kyis byang chub sems dpa 'a sgrib pa thang rngar par sel ba'i ting 'dzir dang ye
107a5(mdo sde): ngang stobs dang / rnad par 'phrul pa'i brgya drag stong gi char yang mi phong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thang rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhog cing
107a6(mdo sde): ldang bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin de dag gi ming tsam yang sring mo 'dis mi shes so// rigs kyi bu gal te sen thang ting 'dzin dang ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas sgring pa thams cad rnam par
107a7(mdo sde): sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba yang mi shes te/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa
107a8(mdo sde): ci ltar 'dor / ci ltar 'jog mi shes par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa 'di
107b1(mdo sde): ston pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes de dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad kyang tshig kyang smras
107b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chugang sems bskyed du bcug ste/ 
107b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs bcu
107b4(mdo sde): na yod ngo do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thad rnam par sel ba 'dis/ sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bgyi dadu bcug ste/ sring mo 'di ci lta ba de dang / 'dra ba'i byang chu
107b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ rigs kyi bu 'as ni shar phyogasu byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcu ge/ phyog sa bcu kun gyi bar du yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu
107b6(mdo sde): nyid da ltar bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ngam/ rigs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i
107b7(mdo sde): dus rang de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ nga ci lta ba de 'dra ba'i
107b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa' bskyed du bcug ste/ de dag da ltar bzhug so// 'tsho gzhe'o// dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs mya ngan las 'ang so// tshig de
108a1(mdo sde): gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi
108a2(mdo sde): khams deng byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang sems can bsam pa yong su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang
108a3(mdo sde): la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad kun bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ srog
108a4(mdo sde): bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag pa dus cus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu tho'o// dge slong
108a5(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu bzhis ni zag pa las ma lus par sems rna ma par grol lo// dge slong lnga stong dang / lha dang mi'i skyed na/ sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni chos la
108a6(mdo sde): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsam pa/ ma pham pa khyod
108a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher shod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
108a8(mdo sde): ma pham pa ji nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do// ma pham pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de
108b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa ci snyed pa dang / gang ma 'ongs pa'i dusu na spyad pa spyod pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ba dang / yongs
108b2(mdo sde): brtag pa gzung na sems can thad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa
108b3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongasu brtag pa gzung na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te/ slar bzhugs par gyur la/ de snyed kying bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi mi'i mthar
108b4(mdo sde): thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur bsti bya sa/ rim gro byas/ bsti stang byas/ mchod pa byas shing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / yun de srid du mchod pa byas
108b5(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ ma pham pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag gis dpe 'di thos nas/ sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur
108b6(mdo sde): de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par
108b7(mdo sde): byed kun chub par byed/ gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed cing / chung ngun thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ma pas
108b8(mdo sde): ba dang mya ngan las 'das nas gang bud med la la zhig gis sring mo the tsom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thang rnam par sel ba de 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug srang
109a1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos sam/ chung ngun chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na// de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du
109a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba ranyes par byed par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// de rabs kyang dran du ra 'gyu ro// gzungs
109a3(mdo sde): kyang thob par 'gyur ro// skye bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mngal du mi gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bud med gang bdag cag
109a4(mdo sde): gi ming thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma
109a5(mdo sde): ba dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa
109a6(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ lo ts+tsha ba bar rnyed pa la dbyangs dang / dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya prah+ma shrI bya ka raH
109a7(mdo sde): rA ra ma hA ya na su tra/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa cher po'i medo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag
109a8(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal bu byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang / thabs gcig tu
109b1(mdo sde): so nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro shas thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer thusong snyoms la bsheg so// yang de'i tshem car yod ci grong khyer gyi
109b2(mdo sde): na byis pa phal po che dgas rdul gyi khyim dang / sa rdul byi rab dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing 'khod pa las byis pa phal po che dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom
109b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te rtse dga' zhing 'khod ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das khe'u de dag la thugs brtse ba
109b4(mdo sde): phyir/ gang na khye'u de dag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so// de nas byis pa de dag gi rang nas khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
109b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bco ma ldan 'das mkhyen bzhin du byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byis pa khyed 'dir ci byed/ de skad ces
109b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di nas rdul gyi khib dag dang / sa rdul gyi ra ba dag dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa
109b7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing mchis lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// becom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sa rdul gyi 'a
109b8(mdo sde): babartsegs pa 'di bdes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba'i sems thugasu chung nas/ thugs 'artse ba'i phyir sa rdul gyi
110a1(mdo sde): 'ang rtsegs pa de bshes so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig dang / yung cas de las rdul gyi khang sa brtsegs pa de ri po ngadudu las grung pa'i
110a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa zhig du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug par gyur te/ de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su ni gser gyi ka brgyad khri bzhi stong zag par gyur/ lho phye gos kyi ngos su ri dngul
110a3(mdo sde): ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ nung phyogs kyi ngos su ni bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ byang phyogs kyi ngos su ni shel gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to/ 
110a4(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul de ma thong nas/ lhag par yang ches dga' ba dang / mchog tu dgar ba rgya chen po skyes par gyur to// de ras bcom ldan 'das la
110a5(mdo sde): khe'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di ga gsol to// kye ma 'jig rten mgon po yis/ rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan/ bdag nyid la ni thugs rtse'i phyir
110a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis ni rdzu 'phrul bstan// drang song che la bdag gis ni// sa rdul khang brtsegs phul ba de// rin po che las grub par gyur// kye ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// kye kyi zhing ni 'di 'dra
110a7(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med pa// mig med mig ni nyam pa dang // shes rab chung ngus mi shes so// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing // 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa dang // dal ba rab dkon thob pas na
110a8(mdo sde): byang chub tu'i sngo lam ga nga/ bdag kyang 'dren pa khyod kyi ni// yon tan rjebu slong bar 'chal// bla med byang chub thob nas ni/ rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bdag gi bgyi// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldam pas
110b1(mdo sde): kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ngas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nal kyi sgonas 'od zer la dog snga tshogs 'di sa ste/ sngon po dang / se po dang / dbang po nga / da' bo dang / song gdang she ni 'jog
110b2(mdo sde): dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo // de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan radas kyi dbu'i
110b3(mdo sde): gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog 'dren pa'i gtso bo rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
110b4(mdo sde): mdzad na// thugs rje ldan pa 'jig rten smar slad du// deng 'dir ci phyir 'dzum mdzad bdag la gsungs// de skad ces pa/ sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
110b5(mdo sde): ro la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dgara' ngo khyod kyi sa khye'u tshungs pa'i dngal 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bco ldan 'das kyi
110b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / sems kyis smon pa 'dis na/ bskal pa supa stong nyis brgya'i bar du rnams kyang ser dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// des bya
110b7(mdo sde): chub bsgrubs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// zhes gsung so// ngaras
110b8(mdo sde): bcor ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyal la ni dad pa yi// bsod nams chung ngu skye mi 'gyur// chos mchog thos dang dge 'dun la/ gus par ngas par
111a1(mdo sde): de bzhin ro// sangs rgyas la ri dang pa la// byang chub thob par dka' ba med// de phyir byang chub 'dod pas 'dir // 'jig rten 'drer ra mra mchod par bya// kur dga' khye'u 'di rkang
111a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyi// mchog ste dpal dang ldan pa yi// mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten gyi mi 'dren par 'gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin
111a3(mdo sde): bas pa mi khab la dad pa yi// rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal bcom ldan
111a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te/ mngon par bsngo ngo // 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
111a5(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po'i shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsA ba ban de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi du kar sing sa dang / zhu cher gyi lo ts+tsha ba bar de de bcar
111a6(mdo sde): nus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma ta pratA NIb ri hr-id tsha/ nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan pas zhus pa
111a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dusu gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA ra na se drang srong
111a8(mdo sde): ltung ba ri dwags kyi nags na/ dge slong bdun brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso
111b1(mdo sde): ngongos bcod ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang shas thabs bsdams te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma dang ldan pa kur dga' bo dang / byang chub sems
111b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang thabs gcig tu grong khyer bA ra na saM bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong kher bA ra na ser mthar chagasu bsod sems snong
111b3(mdo sde): cing / bram ze mo dpal ldan pa'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / dram ze mo dpal ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ mdzes pa dpa'ar
111b4(mdo sde): bya ba/ dbang po'i ba/ thugs zhi gdul ba dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ zhi ba dul ba bsrungs pa/ sdig pa med pa/ dbang po thul ba/ khado
111b5(mdo sde): bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gas la la rnyog pa med pa/ gsar gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon pa ra 'phags pa/ mi bskod pa/ mi g.yo ba brnyes pa
111b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis 'bar ba la ma me/ ldan ne/ lgang nge zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngesepas dang bar gyur te/ de sems dang bas bac+doMs la ba der song sde phyir ras/ bcwam
111b7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs dang / byang dub sems dpa' sa pas dpa' chen po ma pham pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ras/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
111b8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par byon to// bcom ldan 'das legs par byod to// ma ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhug su gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcas pa
112a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma phas pa so so ci rigs par bzhug so// de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sa pas dpa' sems
112a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen pa la phab pa bang bar bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcol ldan 'das grong khyer
112a3(mdo sde): bA ra na se drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi gnas 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes bdag gi thos na bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i
112a4(mdo sde): de ji lta bu zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / brtsam ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal ldan pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis
112a5(mdo sde): rung byed kyi rkyeran gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pI rkyer gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg
112a6(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyer gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
112a7(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'angadu byung
112a8(mdo sde): 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pa/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye
112b1(mdo sde): mched drug 'gags pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas/ sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid
112b2(mdo sde): 'gag srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ 
112b3(mdo sde): ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dpal ldan ma/ dge sbyong ngam/ bra ze'am/ lha 'am bang dungam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang 'thun
112b4(mdo sde): bar 'jig rten du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di grong khyer bA ra na se drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nagasu de bzhin gshegs pas bskor to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bram ze
112b5(mdo sde): ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ma rig pa nang na mchis sam/ slad rol da mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
112b6(mdo sde): pa/ dpal ldan pa de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ ma rig pa nang dang slad rol rab mchis pa lags na/ ma mchis pa de ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rte
112b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang 'jig rten pha rol ras pachi'am/ bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni ma yin// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis sam
112b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni med de/ dpal ldan ma ma rig pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi/ yang dag par rnam par mi 'byung ngo // dpal ldan la
113a1(mdo sde): pa rig pa'i phyin ci log gi rnam par 'byung gi/ phyin cis log pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma mchis ra 'du byed
113a2(mdo sde): rnams ci las 'byung sdug bsngal yang ci las byung / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs shing n+ya gro da'i rtsab ma mchis/ de'i yal ga dang lo ra ma dang / yal ga phre'u ji ltar ma
113a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung zhing mchis pa ma lags ra ma rig pa 'du byed rnams kyi rkyer lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
113a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ de bzhin te dpal ldan ma rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma shes pa ma rtogs pa dag las mngon par
113a5(mdo sde): 'du byed nga / las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'a grub par byed do// srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad de/ 'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa yang su yang
113a6(mdo sde): meng ring sring pa mngon par 'gra par byed pa yang med de/ de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o// dpal ldan ma dzad kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas/ tha sad
113a7(mdo sde): nye bar bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams la chos stod to// dpal ldan ma tha snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te/ 
113a8(mdo sde): ci'i phyir 'i na/ de la khong du chud par byed pa po yang mad de la shes par byed pa yang med pa'i phyir ro// dpal ldan pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul la/ de bzhin ga
113b1(mdo sde): pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa gzhan sprul na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// sprul pa sprul pa gang yin pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun
113b2(mdo sde): ba slu ba'i chos can no// dpal ldan pa de bzhin du gang gis chos mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun bslu ba'i chos ca ro// chos gang mngon par 'du bya
113b3(mdo sde): ba de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa sla ba'i chos can// gsol pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byon pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i
113b4(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang / bskor ba ma lags pa'i 'khor lo dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skyab ma
113b5(mdo sde): mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i lo/ ra lo dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo 'jib skor ba ni/ namakha'i 'khor lo 'di bskor lag so// 
113b6(mdo sde): nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs
113b7(mdo sde): nga'i su na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar chos kyi 'khor lo de lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
113b8(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi me 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog dum
114a1(mdo sde): kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ngas/ de dag gis 'jig rte
114a2(mdo sde): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sdang bas khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'phags nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba byas ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
114a3(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
114a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ri/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzub pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyer gang lags/ ri skad ces
114a5(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems pa pa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma pham pa khyod kyis bram ze po dpal ldan pa
114a6(mdo sde): 'di tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lag so// bcom ldan
114a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa bram ze mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad du rtsa bzhi ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas drug khri ba'i stong la ste
114a8(mdo sde): stang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur/ de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur/ zos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongasu
114b1(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur// sen grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la
114b2(mdo sde): 'god par 'gyuraro// dbye ma'i tshe phyi ma'i sun bdag sna ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
114b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du'u byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni ba skal pa stong tshang bar 'gyur ro// de sems can grangs med dngag tu med pa dag
114b4(mdo sde): gi don byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa
114b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa
114b6(mdo sde): yod de/ bram ze mo dpal ldan ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas/ sngon bud med kyi lus nyis la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku
114b7(mdo sde): la me tog gi 'phreng ba gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi sku la yang chos gos gsol te/ de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spya // bcom ldan
114b8(mdo sde): 'das de la zab me'i gnas rnams kyang zhuso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyo ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang zhal zas kyi tshim par byas so// bstabs pa yang bso// 
115a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la yang a ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag blangs so// de bzhin
115a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gser thub la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bgron du gnyer te/ bcom ldan 'das des zla
115a3(mdo sde): ba gnyis bshos gsol to// chags zung zhig kyang phu lo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la gser gyi phreng bas gdor te
115a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar 'thud med kyi dngos po las mang gyur cig ces smras te/ ma phan pa 'di yang bram ze mo dpal
115a5(mdo sde): ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsab yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang / bram ze mo dpal ldan
115a6(mdo sde): ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan pas zhus
115a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ 
115a8(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ dI r+g+ha na kha pa ri pra dza ka pa ri pri tshA nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ kun tu rgyu ba sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
115b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di sang bdag gis thos pa'i dusu gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
115b2(mdo sde): tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar 'dug pa/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ 
115b3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de'i tshe kun tu rgyu ser ris bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar/ khang ba
115b4(mdo sde): la.oM tshugs bcas te/ cang mi smra bar la gu nas/ blta sa te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyego'u ta ma 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ las
115b5(mdo sde): bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi 'ching ba can/ las brtan bar bya'o zhes de skad smras pa ni bded na/ dge sbyong go'u tu mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dag
115b6(mdo sde): sbyong go'u ma rdo rje'i lus dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di rings tshe rabs snga la'i skye bar srog gcod pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// 
115b7(mdo sde): dge slong go'u ta mas sngoran las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u tu ma sor mo ring zhing sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze char
115b8(mdo sde): po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yino// dge sbyong go'u tams sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge slong go'u ta pa dbang po
116a1(mdo sde): yongasu tshang zhing lus rab tu rgyas par gyur/ brjes kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas che bas snga ma'i skye bas 'dod pa/ la log par g.yas pa spangs pa'i
116a2(mdo sde): las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags ra/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma lces gdong gi dkyil 'khor thar khabs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
116a3(mdo sde): sprul pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yi no// dge sbyong go'u tra mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dag
116a4(mdo sde): spyong go' ta ma seng ge'i stabasu 'gro bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga pa'i skye bar 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i rang
116a5(mdo sde): myos pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs pa'i las de'i 'a bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci zhig byas shi nga bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma so bzhi bcu dang
116a6(mdo sde): ldan zhing so mnyam la so dkar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni/ ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar dusu ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras
116a7(mdo sde): bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma tshul khrims kyi spos kyis lus byugs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
116a8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tsher rabs snga ma'i skye bar 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / kha dog 'chang ba spangs pa'i las der 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u nyams sngon las ci
116b1(mdo sde): zhig byas shing bsags na/ de dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma lus mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar gla dang
116b2(mdo sde): gar dang / rgyan rnams spangs pas las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u thams sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsngags na/ ngas dge sbyong go'u dam stan gsum la yongs su spyod/ bac+doM
116b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di rings tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar khri stan mthong po dang / khri stan chen po spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu len no// dge sbyong go'u thams sdod las ci zhig byas
116b4(mdo sde): shing gsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma mgo'i gtsug tor 'phags par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar/ sangs rgyas dang
116b5(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun du/ pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang/ bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te mgo bos phyag 'tsha'o// mchod pa'i
116b6(mdo sde): las de'i 'bras bu yin no// de ras kun tu rgyu ser ris kyis khar bas la bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'alas ga la bde log su thal po sna
116b7(mdo sde): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kyis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes la skyab su 'chi'o// ji srid 'tsha
116b8(mdo sde): bar dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// srog chags thams cad gsod dang / gzhan nong rku dang mi tshangs spong ba
117a1(mdo sde): dang / ngag gi bye ba brdzun dang pos skyes su yi zab dang / 'phreng ba la dog glu dang gang dang rtse 'jo la bstan mazan po rnams// de nas bdag gis sngas de yod da rgyang
117a2(mdo sde): bcom tshul du bgyi// de bzhin du la gnyis lar gsum du'o// bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyis sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa 'di sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / byang chub
117a3(mdo sde): chog su 'gyur ba dang / dor gyi dam pa thams cad mkhan pa'i ye shes dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig/ bcom ldan las kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen 'i khyod
117a4(mdo sde): byed pa legaso log so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dadag dang / lha dang pi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
117a5(mdo sde): pa mngon par bstod ngo // / kun tu rgyu med rings kyis zhus pa'i mdo rdzogaste// / bka' dang por gtogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
117a6(mdo sde): su bar+NabA lu ko pa rA pa la hA yA ra sA tra/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa gser gyi phye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ra // sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 
117a7(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kur dag rar ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dudu men pa
117a8(mdo sde): rang bya chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ denas tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar das/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs
117b1(mdo sde): la gzugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud das/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
117b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod tad nga gtum mchis pa
117b3(mdo sde): ldan lags sa pa/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// kun dga' bo bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
117b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ring ngag tu med do// kun dga'asade bzhin gshegs de dgra bcub pa yang dag par rdzos sa bi'i sa sa rgyas rnams ra/ yod tan ga tu med pa dang lnga
117b5(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' ngos lar gnyisu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
117b6(mdo sde): dpag tu la la ris pa lags sa pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon par dpag tum la rmis pa dang ldan lags
117b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang lan gnyis lar gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal rna
117b8(mdo sde): tu dang / kun dag 'ab bzhi gshegs pa dag mal pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas rnams de yang tan dngag tu yang ba dang yang lda nga/ ku dag po khyed dab ra ga
118a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi dpag tu yang ba mnyan pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dpa// de sang ngas pa
118a2(mdo sde): sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsel
118a3(mdo sde): dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
118a4(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis mo'u dgal gyi bu cher po rdzu 'phrul ci lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ngag tu 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ ma'u dgal gyi bu ma po rdzu 'phrul ci lnga
118a5(mdo sde): phyogs dang phyags mtshams ngag tu mchi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kur dag
118a6(mdo sde): khyod la dod 'di dpes bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag debs don rdzogs par 'gyur ba yang pa'i phyir ro/ kun dga' bo dper ra/ rdzing dpag tshad brgyad snang pa
118a7(mdo sde): nas gang ba/ bya khras btung du rung bar ru dang kha dbang du 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis/ rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i
118a8(mdo sde): lcags kyi shing rta la zhor te/ de yang mu khyud kyi shing yang tshul mi reg/ rta rnams kyi mig pa yang yul mi reg/ pad+ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi brtol ba tsam gyi stobs dang shugs pa
118b1(mdo sde): mgyogs pa de lta bus rgyug la/ kun dgara' bdonas rdzi de'i nang nas sbrul gdugu pa zhig byung das/ shing rta ngo mtsho'i nang nas phyi ma log pa de'i bar skabs shing dade la na brkyang bskyo / kun dgang
118b2(mdo sde): bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan cig bskor ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu/ kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo khod tshig gcig
118b3(mdo sde): smra ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabasu ro'u dgal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / dor kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo lo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dag gcig smra yun ci tsam pa
118b4(mdo sde): de bar skabasu gnas partan shA ri'i bu/ chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// gnas brtan shA hA ti'i bu/ tshig gcig smra ba'i lung cicas pa de'i bar skabs
118b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa/ rnam pa grangs med pa ste na to// rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra'i yun cirtsam 'de'i raskabasu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bstar ba dang gra
118b6(mdo sde): med bsam gyis mi khab brjod du med pa stor cing / dor kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabs// kun dga' bo gnas brtan
118b7(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rnar gyi khams brgyad khri 'ang ro// kun dga' bo rdzu 'phral gyi stobs bsred pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis/ nying mtshar bdun gyi bar ngul mi bso bar shar phyogasu 'jig
118b8(mdo sde): gyi khams ji srid du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / rub phyogs dang / byang ngogs dang / de bzhin du shang lho'i mtshams dang / lho rub kyi me khams dang nub byang gi mtshams dang / bya
119a1(mdo sde): shar kyi ma jams dang / de bzhin du srung ring / 'og gi phyog su 'i mtshar bdun kyi bar dadul li bse bar song la/ de ras si la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rdar gyi khams
119a2(mdo sde): thams dang rabs bskor te/ ra bas bskor nas rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / gyongasu med par byas te/ mthor dpar med par byas ras/ grong khyer gcig tu thas la khrod khyer gcig tu byas ras kyang yongs su
119a3(mdo sde): 'brus bkang ste/ byung ngur byas ra/ kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i rang gi yung 'bru ci snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang / ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems cad byang chub la zhugs pa dgangs mthong
119a4(mdo sde): de ngas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rter gyi khams
119a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris pa ga du skye ba dgra ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'a jig rten khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga'
119a6(mdo sde): ldan gyis lnga'i ris dag na 'dod pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang chos mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag par rdzi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo // 
119a7(mdo sde): de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag pa ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches rang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub
119a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams pa'i mngal ras 'azung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // debs kyang chos mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis dbyed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo // debs kyang
119b1(mdo sde): ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas/ rab tu 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa/ byang
119b2(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po dag ngas mthong
119b3(mdo sde): ngo rabs kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches yang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag ra/ byang chub seMngal rnams byang chub
119b4(mdo sde): kyi snying po la gces par byed pa'i mchog dang / gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dgangs mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpal mas
119b5(mdo sde): chab kyi snying po 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // dngas kyang sa mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag ra/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dag ngas ma
119b6(mdo sde): de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches
119b7(mdo sde): mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'angon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang
119b8(mdo sde): mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcod ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dgangs mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches yang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngag ra/ sangs rgyas
120a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams yongasu mya ngan 'das pa chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de dag thang kyang mtshan 'thun pa dang ga rngu 'thur ba sha stag yin na/ 'jig rten gyi kham
120a2(mdo sde): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la bskor ba byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dagu pa dang / byang chub
120a3(mdo sde): kyi shing na 'dug pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa/ mtshan tha dad pa dang / gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos
120a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang / byang chub
120a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed gcig mchis lag sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo na
120a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ kun
120a7(mdo sde): dga' bo dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na/ gser gyi bye ma dkon pa 'dra ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gong dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
120a8(mdo sde): rnams byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/ kun dga' bo ci ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA
120b1(mdo sde): klung gi byes de dag las la la zhig gis byem 'bru gcig blas pa de bzhin du/ gang dusungs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang chuchus
120b2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni nyu // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sepas dpa' de dag da
120b3(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yid dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba
120b4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dradro de dang / prad \u0f85 ba ra ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyur
120b5(mdo sde): cing nus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ba ri br-ing cha nA ma ma hA yA ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen por
120b6(mdo sde): mdo bam po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig ra/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i kun nas mdzes pa'i khang pa na
120b7(mdo sde): slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gis dge 'dun po dang / dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 'dul ba brgyad stong mang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang po la sogs
120b8(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' rin po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la sku pi g.yo bar bzhugs pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121a1(mdo sde): po 'jab dpal la/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stad las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig 'a byas nas/ pus po g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
121a2(mdo sde): logasu thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po gang gis/ 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du pa'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par
121a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dru 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po de ci snyed tshad ci tsam lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
121a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jim dang / la bsod nams chen po gang gis 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa / de bzhin gshes
121a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi dadung du gyur pa'i bsod nams chen po de ni/ shes rab las byung ba/ snying rje chen ngos yongs su bsgos pa yin te/ bsam gyis khyab bo// 'jab dpal 'dzam+bu'i gling gi
121a6(mdo sde): sems cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thaMd kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bas de rnams kyi phung po da/ brgyar bsgyur
121a7(mdo sde): bas gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ de rin po che sna bdud 'di lte ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin 'o cha dang / ni rin pa che nga
121a8(mdo sde): nong du rjin po me dang / slong pa rin po ma dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / 'di bdun 'byung ngo // de la bu stong dpa' brtul po pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi rje
121b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'jom pa rnams yod de/ 'jam dbul de ltar khor los snang ba'i rgyal ba / rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de sa
121b2(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams che zhing mthu chen por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams
121b3(mdo sde): kyi phung po de rgyur bsgyur bas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang por 'gyur te/ de ltar lha'i dbang po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che'o// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
121b4(mdo sde): ngag thams cad brgya byir gyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems cad de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang 'dod
121b5(mdo sde): ba'i kham su bstan pas/ go bar byed pa/ 'dod pa'i khang+ga kyi dbang po bdud du 'gyur te/ de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi bang po ba du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mgyu ro// 'jas pa
121b6(mdo sde): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems cad de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po
121b7(mdo sde): gyur pa'i bsod napas brgya stong bsgyur bas/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khab pa stong gi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can rdzi
121b8(mdo sde): sna nga de dag thams cad / stong gi bdag gi rangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad bsod nas su gyur pa'i bsod rams kyi phung por brgya stong du bsgyur bas
122a1(mdo sde): gang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab pa stong gnyis kyi bdag po chos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems cad ji
122a2(mdo sde): snyeng ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
122a3(mdo sde): pa de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas/ khyab pa tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bdag po dbang phyugs chen po'i mchog tu
122a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dbang phyug char po la ltos// nam bskal pa 'jig pa na/ bskal pa'i chu 'byung ba de'i tshe/ phyis bar gyi ba skal pa gcig tu char 'bab cing / chu'i thigs pa 'byung ba nges
122a5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rkus gang bar byed de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus gang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thad kyang tshangs pa dbang
122a6(mdo sde): phyug chen po'i mchog des sheso// de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che mthu che ba yin te/ dge ba'i rtsab chungasu ni dbang phyug chen por mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen
122a7(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thang kyi
122a8(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod na mas kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas mthu chen po thob pa'i rang sangs rgyasu gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong cheran po'i 'dzin
122b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams lta re shig zhog ste/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi sa par/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji srid pa de dag thams cad/ mas rgyas ma rgya chen po thong
122b2(mdo sde): bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad gyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i
122b3(mdo sde): tha mar gyur pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal na mkha'i khams kyi mtha' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang
122b4(mdo sde): rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi/ sems can ji snyed de dag thams cad
122b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa'i bsod nam sa kyi phung po deng ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod rams kyi phung po
122b6(mdo sde): de bye ba khrag khrig badz+ra stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spre'i khung bu gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska la/ spu'i khung bu brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu re re
122b7(mdo sde): nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpel gang spa'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bskur bas/ de ba'i
122b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'as byang bzang po brgyad nu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal dpe byang bzang po brgyangs
123a1(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i gang bsod rnams kyi phung po che snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gas zhabs gcig ri tshe
123a2(mdo sde): rjes kyi mtshan brgyad cu la/ 'di lta ste/ gdagus dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / phreng ba dang / kyo bathang dang / cod pan dang / dashig to dang / bum pa dang / glang po dang / rta dang / stag dang / chu srid da
123a3(mdo sde): nya dang / ru smal dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang tiSha dang / tsA sha dang / ngun pa dang / re tso dang / ngang pa dang / thi ba dang / nas dang / sman chen po dang / 'od ma dang / ba man dang / klu dang / ra dang / khyA
123a4(mdo sde): mchog dang / ri dang / bil ba dang / shing dang / ri dgas nag po dang / nor bu rin po che dang / ral gyi mchog dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gshel
123a5(mdo sde): gtan dang / sta re dang / zhags pa dang / gru dang / mu tig gi rgyad dang / sprin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'khor srung po dang / chu'i lha dang / 'phags skyes po dang / rig mi ba
123a6(mdo sde): dang / nor sbyin dang / drang srong chen po dang / dpal dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / me dang / rlung dang / pad+mo dang / g.yung drung dang / grwa gsum dang / dge ba'i stan dang / me long dang / rnga ya ba dang / rma dur ba dang
123a7(mdo sde): bu ror sha dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rnga dang / dung dang / mri dang ga dang / gdu bu dang / dpung brgyan dang / rna cha dang / sor dashu dang / rnam byang phral can dang / me tog bzang po dang / dpag bsam shing
123a8(mdo sde): rasa'akhor lo'i dpung gi seng ge dang / 'di rnams rnams ni ri mo rjes kyi mtshan brgyad cu yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gang
123b1(mdo sde): cang brgyad cu'i ri mor gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i/ bsod nams kyi phung pod/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dusur bsgyung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu che pom
123b2(mdo sde): mtshan gcig tu 'gyur te/ de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis re rer 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dbu'i gtsug tor du/ dbu skra mi thu mthing la g.yas phyogasu 'khyil pa dang / 'phral
123b3(mdo sde): mnyam ba dang / kha dog gis brgyan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / sbyin mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma 'dra ba dang / so bzhi bcu thags bzang ba dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge
123b4(mdo sde): 'dra dang / lce che zhing srab pa dang / ro stong seng dge 'dra bad nga/ shing n+ya grong ltar mu zheng gab pa dang / sku khung bu re re nas skye ba dang / ngo mtshan mi snang bar nub pa dang / brla gang zhing
123b5(mdo sde): zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e na ya 'dra ba dang / zhabs rting pa che ba dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / zhabs dang phyag gi sor ro'i bar du
123b6(mdo sde): nges 'brel ba darang / zhabs dang phyag gi sor po ring ba dang / zhabs kyi steng mtho ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / dpung go zlum pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / lpags pa srab la gser gyi kha dog
123b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba dang / ma btung bar phyag pus me'i ldangs la reg pa dang / zhabs rab tu gnas pa dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i dashangs dang / 'di dag na
123b8(mdo sde): skes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
124a1(mdo sde): gang gyur pa'i bsod rnams kyi phung po de/ grangs med par bsgyur ba dang / bsam gyis khab par bskur ba dang / dpags med par bsnang ba dang / brjod du med par ba
124a2(mdo sde): bas nga bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dadung 'gyur ro// chos kyi drang ngas 'dul ba'i dbang du bzhin gshegs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad meng par dbyangs kyi sa rig par byeda'o// dbyangs kyis
124a3(mdo sde): lta ba de bzhin du 'ong dang skus kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de ltar shes rab chen po las byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang slong lam gyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims
124a4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par las yang dag par skyes pa bsod nams chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rangs ngas rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
124a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rgya gnyis kyis de bzhir gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'dags pa yin// rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ slo na lam gyi dbang dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi
124a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang ngo // 'jam dpal rgyud de gnyis kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad du 'phags pa yin ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
124a7(mdo sde): kyi sku khyad par 'phags pa ci lta ba/ de bzhin du chos bstan pa yang / khyad par du phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ci lta ba de bzhin du 'od kyang khyad par
124a8(mdo sde): du 'jigs pa yin no// 'jam dpal ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'ong khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin du spyod pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgras 'jig
124b1(mdo sde): rjer thams cad du khyab pa yin pa/ 'jam dpal kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod pa'i bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag de dang de lta
124b2(mdo sde): bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal mtshan gyi bye brag gang dang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba mtshan gyi bye brag de dang da lta bur de bzhin gshegs
124b3(mdo sde): pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa chos stor
124b4(mdo sde): par sems can rnams kyis sheso// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jug pa dang // 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de nga de la de bzhin ga
124b5(mdo sde): pa gnas par sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dang / la de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten par byang
124b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur pa yang / skye bo mang mo la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang skya bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ste'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
124b7(mdo sde): dpal sngar las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa gang zag
124b8(mdo sde): zla med pa/ khams gsum na mgon po'i mchog/ sems can thad la phan par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos mi bskyod pa/ na mkha' ltar mi gos pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam par nges pa
125a1(mdo sde): lta 'dod pa/ blta na sdug pa/ 'di 'dra ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ras
125a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 
125a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ nan pra pra dzA sU tra/ bod skad du/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i ma
125a4(mdo sde): thams cad mder pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro ta'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga
125a5(mdo sde): dro chos gos dang / shams thabs mnams te/ lhung gzeng bsna mas nas/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'a bo dang / ser skya'i gnasu bsod snyoms la gshegs
125a6(mdo sde): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rings
125a7(mdo sde): pa ringes par bcom ldan 'das kyi che du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa leg so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa
125a8(mdo sde): la bzhugasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
125b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags
125b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no// 'dod cha dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba
125b3(mdo sde): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sgra dang / g.yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no// lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yi no// rin po che thams
125b4(mdo sde): 'byung gnas yi no// bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhi nor bu yin no// yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no// sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no// 'byung po tha~Md kyi yang
125b5(mdo sde): brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la mi 'jig pa sbyin pa yin ro// sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa yin ro// skabs med pa rnams kyi dbang gnyen yir
125b6(mdo sde): ma tshol bas 'phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa rnams kyi bstis yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa 'dres pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya pa yi ro/ 
125b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no// thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin ro// sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen pa bya ba yin no// snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bstar par bya ba yid sa pa
125b8(mdo sde): song gi sgo bcod pa yino// mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo 'bedar ba yin no// lha'i 'gro ba rnams kar tha' gengs pa yi no// sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu gcod pa yin ro// sred pa'i bcing
126a1(mdo sde): bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khab yin no// thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yino// 
126a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no// rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yino// phra rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no// lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yod
126a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin ro// bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yino// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byeng ba yin no// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa yin no// nu zho'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin// 
126a4(mdo sde): ras pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin no// phung po'i khur 'jog pa yino// nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byir
126a5(mdo sde): pa yin no// khyim gyi gzeb du bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no// gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no// the tsom rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i dris
126a6(mdo sde): brdan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yino// rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no// sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa yin no// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde
126a7(mdo sde): ba dang / mi 'jig pa'i 'gram yin no// 'dong ba'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams las rnam
126a8(mdo sde): par rgal bar byed pa yin no// don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin ro// gti mug gi
126b1(mdo sde): mud pa'i spyod ma yin no// rgyu dag par byed pa yin/ nyan mongs pa'i nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// lam stong ba rnams la las kun du ston pa yin no// chos thams cad kyi de khor
126b2(mdo sde): pa yin no// bdud pa thams cad rnam par 'grol bar byed pa yin no// ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa
126b3(mdo sde): yid ro// la lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rngom par byed pa yin ro// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yino// tshul khrims phur sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa
126b4(mdo sde): yin no/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dga' ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi gnaso// stob pa med
126b5(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi slob pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'brel ba rnam sa kyis mi 'jig par byed pa yin no// skabs med pa rnams kyi skabs yid ro// sdug bsngal gyi bde ba'i yo byad
126b6(mdo sde): yin ros 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tubyung ba zhes bya'o// lha dang mi rnams kyis bkar sti byas pa yin no// ke mi'i dbang po rnams kyis
126b7(mdo sde): mchod pa yi'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no// skra'i lung 'dreg pa yir ro// gos pa
126b8(mdo sde): smig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin ro// rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin ro// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal ma da yir re/ bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'job
127a1(mdo sde): pa yin no// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na/ ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni 'khor las
127a2(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal srid bde ba bas kyang ches khang par du 'phags par bde ba yin na/ dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang shing tu rnyed par bka' ba yin
127a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba ri ribs kyang ches rnyed par bka' ba yi no// dga' bo thar pa 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang / gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan
127a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dadu bcas te sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo // de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung ngo nga
127a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad tsas gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la/ sbyin pa dag stsal/ bsod nams dag bgyi zhing / bac+doMs
127a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / skar gyi gsos smad dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom
127a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar 'gyur la/ 
127a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu po dad pa can la las lo brgyad 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal star dang / nad kyis gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed
127b1(mdo sde): nad dga' bo de ni byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ ngas mi
127b2(mdo sde): mnyes ma byed cig// dga' bo dper nas chen po 'di ma gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la/ dan du sprul zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ ngan gnya' shing gi bu ga gcig pa gcig kyang rgyu la/ rus sbal
127b3(mdo sde): zhar ba de 'di skad du/ gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chung bar bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing / gnya' shing bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskod nas/ phyogs phyogasu rgyug par byed par
127b4(mdo sde): dga' bo rgyal po rten 'ing gis du sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu gder 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yi no// ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa bzhin ro// dga' bo khang
127b5(mdo sde): kyis mi ring shin rnyed dka' ba dang / de bzhin du ngal pa phur sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / ngal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed// dga' bo stor pa mngon gyur pa// la
127b6(mdo sde): mi gnyis ma byed cig/ dper na 'ga' zhig khyab kyi mig gnam du bstan te/ nyungs dkar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed/ dga' bo rgyal nyen zhig gis der nyungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chung bar 'gru
127b7(mdo sde): gyi dga' bo mi nyid rnyed pa ni pa yid do// ral pa phur sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no// dga' bo nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhi nga ngal 'phar sum tshogs pa yang rnyid na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung
127b8(mdo sde): ral ba shar tu de dgar dang // dga' ba sto ba mngom gyur pa/ nga' chi mdzes bad cig// de ri'i pi 'i na/ bskal pa bya ba stong dang ni// brgya nga brag khrig gas yang // sangs rdzas snga mi zas mams
128a1(mdo sde): mthong ba ga la zhig/ u dusu pa ra'i me tog ri// shing las shin tu rnyed dkar ldar// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/ khod kyis nga 'i rlung gyur sa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / 
128a2(mdo sde): ngal pa shing 9ra dka' ste// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la mi mnyis ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par ra
128a3(mdo sde): ras ni khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yang
128a4(mdo sde): par bstod ngo // // dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mang rdza gas so// / 'di bka' dang po gtogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar tsi t+ya rA dza sU tra nA ma ma hA yA
128a5(mdo sde): ra sA tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thang la phyag 'tshalo// 'di ska
128a6(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ma bcom ldan 'das yul pa ga pAr/ chos kyi dab dgon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po ches spras pa'i pad+mar snying po'i gdar la bzhug
128a7(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du red pa'i yang brjed du meng ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
128a8(mdo sde): par po rngams pa thabs gcig tu bzhug sa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la spras
128b1(mdo sde): pa kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'ang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'idzi'i bsku
128b2(mdo sde): pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhiran gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi ming bde ba car gyi 'jig rter khams kyi 'dzi zhag gcig go/ 
128b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin
128b4(mdo sde): ba de ri/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'job pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyid 'ag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de bzhir gshegs
128b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yid pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
128b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od gzer shin tu stug po pad+ma rag rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag nga ba'ir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
