178a5(mdo sde): thams cad mnyes par bgyid cing dbyis par bgyid par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad longs spyod bar rgyu ra cig/ sems can thams cad yongs smid par bgyid par gyur
178a6(mdo sde): cig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang / chos sla ba thams cad mgu bar bgyi cing dga' bar bgyid par gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa yang dag par 'dzid cing
178a7(mdo sde): srung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa'i ling tog thang rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig/ bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thang rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dngon
178a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ ti 'dzin thams cad dang / dbang thams cad thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa thad kyis rnam par phyin pa dang / rnam par thar pa thad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa
178b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ ci nas kyang 'khor ba ni mi 'bral zhing / tshe rabs gzhan du rjes pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rol tu phyin pa bskyad par mi 'gyur ba dang / byis pa
178b2(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo dang 'dre bar 'grib pa'i chadang 'thun par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
178b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas de dag la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bgyid du 'chi ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i
178b4(mdo sde): rgya ma de'i tha pa'i sems bskyed pa thob pa yongasu rdzogs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// 'chi ba rings kyi cher yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gser
178b5(mdo sde): kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig/ ci ras bdag dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba bkod pa rgyur thogs pa ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178b6(mdo sde): yongasu bsgos pa'i sems dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i ngasu bgyid par gyur cig/ dad pa grangs ma ma ris pa dang / ri mo gus par bgyi ba grangs pa mchis
178b7(mdo sde): dang dka' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lta zhing rtag la/ kur tu smra ba bzhin du'achi ba'i dusu bgyid par gyur cig/ mchod pa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin
178b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdagus dang / rgyal ma nga nga / bangs dang ba tu ma mchis pa dag gis nga bad
179a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing lta la rtog bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thang na/ sems ca dmyal
179a2(mdo sde): thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyun rang par gyur cig/ lha dbul po tha~Mng dang / mi dbul po thams cad dang / ser sna thams cad dang / 'jal pa
179a3(mdo sde): khrims thams cad dang / gdong sems thaMng dang / le lo thams cad dang / rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab thams cang rgyur chad par gyur cig/ byang chub tu sems bsrang ba dang sangs
179a4(mdo sde): rgyas la lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsab 'dis bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thang dang / lus
179a5(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur cig/ ngag mnyam pa dang khams mnyam pa dang / ye shes mnyam par gyur cig ji ltar gong du yang sangs rgyu sa bcom ldan 'das dag gis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi
179a6(mdo sde): mkhyer pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa 'i yang debs pa khyed cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
179a7(mdo sde): chub tu yongs bsngo bar bgyi bde bzhin du/ bzhi kyang dge ba'i bya / gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / zil gyis mi nod pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thang sdang ba
179a8(mdo sde): dang / yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i yong su byos su sngo'o// ji ltar bdag gi don tu yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bas ma lus pa thas
179a9(mdo sde): rnams langag pa rdzogs pa kyi phung byom su cwa co mchag la masu sngo'o// mdza rtsam pa nga ga mas nam sakyi la dag mim sa mapa pa masum lam ma mi mi me da ma chim pa sa mam ba
179b1(mdo sde): cang dang / sems cad rdzi ba sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems cad gyi khams de dag thaMd kyi ched du yang yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la su dag shas kyis 'dzin par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang
179b2(mdo sde): rjesu yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbas so/ 
179b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'chags pa kha da ma tho ba med pa yin/ rje su yi rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bskul ba khar ma tho ba meng ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa kha ra ma tho
179b4(mdo sde): ba yeng pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba khan ma tho ba med pa yid/ deH/ da ces spras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas/ byed chub sems dpa' ngos thams cad la dam 'a
179b5(mdo sde): gnas pa la 'di sad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
179b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing / des yang lag la gdug par ba ste/ nges pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa ra/ tshig 'di sa ches sems can thad g.yas phyogs kyi la
179b7(mdo sde): la gnas par gyur cig ces brjed par bya'o// des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa la/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag g.yor phyogs kyi lam la gnas par dag
179b8(mdo sde): raphags pa'i lam la gnas shing / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yas pa sa la 'dzugs pa ra tshig 'di skad ces ji ltar de bzhir gshegs
180a1(mdo sde): pa byang chub kyi snying por chog das pa la bzhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dam ldan pas/ dpung du sku dang / skyil lo krung la yongs su byug te/ phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas
180a2(mdo sde): bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul te/ byang chub bsnyes pa de bzhin du/ sems can 'di bdag gis kyang bdud phyir rgol ba tshem so par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cings chen po la bsdad
180a3(mdo sde): ras sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yod pa sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te/ phyogs 'dzin
180a4(mdo sde): ba'adul dkar ba de dag thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin bsdung par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des gdo nga 'phra labs la gdug pa mtshig 'di skad ces sems ma
180a5(mdo sde): nga rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla ma rnams la rim gro bgyi rnyed cing / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ngo // dag pa'i las thang 'phags par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag yan lag lnga
180a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar gyur cig/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig/ ma/ 
180a7(mdo sde): par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig/ mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig/ sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du'angags par gyur cig/ tshul khrims
180a8(mdo sde): byad par du 'phags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin khyad par du'aphags pa dang / shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba
180b1(mdo sde): khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa lnga dang bral ba dang / stobs lnga la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa dang
180b2(mdo sde): ma bral bas/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dang ldan lags pa/ gsung dag pa gsung mi mnga' ba/ sems dang sems mi mnga' ba/ ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan
180b3(mdo sde): pang ma byon pa ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/ yang ga
180b4(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' dang / bdag gi mtha' ma 'tshal pas/ chos ma lags pa la cho su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / 'dul ba ma lags pa la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / spyir gnas ma lags pa la sbyir
180b5(mdo sde): gan su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phyin ci log gi sems kyis bdag gi sems kyis bdag gi lus lte bas yongasu bkris pa dang / 
180b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos gang sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal pa mngon par 'dus bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang bar 'gyur ba gang ci mchis pa de dag 'tshig so// mi
180b7(mdo sde): pa la gnas te/ bdag gis sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du la du shes pa dang / sems sgyu ma go bu ma 'tshal nas/ blan ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes
180b8(mdo sde): gang lags pa dathams cad 'chag so// bdag gis mngon par 'dub gyid pa ma mchis par 'tshal das / lus dang ga dang yid kyis chos dge ba dang / mi dge ba mngon par bgyi dang dang / mngon par po rgyas
181a1(mdo sde): pa gang lag pa de 'chag so// bdag gis sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid phung la nas/ dmig
181a2(mdo sde): par ldang bas sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / lus dang sems la gnas te
181a3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'du shes dang / dmigs pa la gnas te/ bsapa gtan skyed pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rag tu 'jug pa la mngon par dga' bas/ shes rab rnam par dbyung ba
181a4(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag 'chag so// bdag gis don dam pa'i mtsho dpam 'tshal nas/ gzugs dang rgyan dang / mtshan la mngon pa ra zhen pas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lag
181a5(mdo sde): pa de dag 'chag so// bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye/ sa lam zhugs kyis/ chos tha dad pa la gnas te/ chos ma nyan pa 'am/ bshad pa 'am/ rab tu bsams par gyur
181a6(mdo sde): gang lags pa de 'chag so// dag gis mas 'dus la byas sum 'tshas nas/ dge 'du tshul mang por 'jushes te/ dge 'dun la bsrer bkur bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag 'chagaso// bas
181a7(mdo sde): sa da dpal 'tshas dam mar pa'i gnas bsten te/ 'ang bzung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa dag ga 'chags so// bdag gis chom 'jiganas par 'tshal sa
181a8(mdo sde): 'a'ajig ga lags te/ las rgyas kyi yo sa drang bar zhugs pa gang lags pa bga' chagago// bag gis chos kyi phyis yos su 'alus pas mchis ma 'tshal sa zhugs kyis sa
181b1(mdo sde): sdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa gang lags pa de 'chag so// bdag gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas/ lta ba yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
181b2(mdo sde): chos sumu cu rtsa bdur bsgom pa gang lags pa de 'tshog so// bdag gis dge sbyong gi 'am zhi ba ma 'tshal nas/ rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong gi dngos po bskyed pa gang lags pa de 'chags
181b3(mdo sde): so/ kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsngags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/ 'dusu ma byas las shin tu ring du gyur pa gang lags pa de
181b4(mdo sde): dag 'chags so// zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpas bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / 'bad pa dang
181b5(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / gnas pa dang bcas pa dang / rten dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thang bshags par bya'o// de la 'di lta bu'i
181b6(mdo sde): sdu ba dang / spros pa dang bcas pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de'i sdig pa bshags pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'din bshags pa'i phung po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhar yang byang chub sam
181b7(mdo sde): dpas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces las pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das rnams kyi dang po thugs bskyed paras bzung ste/ bla ma med pa yang dag par
181b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyis bar de dge ba'i rtsab gang ci yang rung / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa rtsub nga ma mchis shing rter
182a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa/ gtong ba ra lachis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi skye ba dang / sems cad ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang / dmigs pa las
182a2(mdo sde): dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems kyi ngo bo nyid la nges par sems pa'i bsam gtan dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la
182a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang / rnam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje dang / chos la kun/ mi 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang / yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang
182a4(mdo sde): lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // khyim gyi dngos po thang bzung ba ma mchis shing yongasu ma bzung ba/ rtsab ma ma chis shing rten ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma dran
182a5(mdo sde): 'dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / ma la gags pa dang / ma skyes pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams pa nga/ lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'dun
182a6(mdo sde): bdang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkas rnams dang / phung po lnga mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams dang / namakha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang / don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang
182a7(mdo sde): rlung kyi yan lam rmoms dang / mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang / zhi ba'i zhi gnas ba pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 'thun pa'i lhag mthong / mngad par shes pa ma
182a8(mdo sde): shes sngom gro ba das thams ca la rje su li rang / thog ma'i mtha' nas lus myong ba nyid mos su dag pa dang / brjod su mchis pa'i garnam pa ga pa dang / sas rgyas la'is gro
182b1(mdo sde): bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang // chos la rim gro bgyi ba chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba tshogs ma mchis shing yon tan ma mchis
182b2(mdo sde): pa dang / spyod lam thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa spyod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de dag gis chos spyod pa yang dag
182b3(mdo sde): pa'i sdom pa bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pa/ 'jig rten thabs cad dang ma 'dres pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thad kyi sar ma nges pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
182b4(mdo sde): bzang po/ las dkar po ma lags pa 'gag par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'i las gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ sangs rgyas
182b5(mdo sde): kyi ye shes thob pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba de ngag thams cad la bdag rje su yi rango // 'das pa dang / da lta ru byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub brnyam
182b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang stobs mi thul ba rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
182b7(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chags pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ga'ang gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / spyi gtsug
182b8(mdo sde): bsngar mi mthong ba namakha' dang mtshungs pa gang lags pa dang / gnyis la mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan cing dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun banam mam lam
183a1(mdo sde): pa na mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang
183a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la shes pa snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi ngo // sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i slad/ thabs mkhas pa'i
183a3(mdo sde): gnas pa dag 'das pa dang / ma byon dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa yongs su mya las 'das pa yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du de dag la mchod pa bgyis
183a4(mdo sde): pa dang bgyid pa dang / bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi nyad thos 'dus pa
183a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang / dad pas rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa rnams dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba rnams dang / log
183a6(mdo sde): pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i rigs kyi sa pa rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste/ zhugs pa rnams dang
183a7(mdo sde): lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang mi 'gro ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas der gnas par 'gyur ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa grangs pa mchis shing skye ba ma mchis pas
183a8(mdo sde): rab tu bye ba rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mngon sum rdzogs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpar/ 
183b1(mdo sde): sems dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang po bsnyed pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
183b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba
183b3(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang / 'dus byas las yongasu rgal ba de dag thams cad la rjesu yi rang ngo // 'das pa dang / ma
183b4(mdo sde): 'os pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i su kyi sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po nga/ bsgom pa dngas
183b5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i ngos par gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi
183b6(mdo sde): rang ba mchog dang / ma 'ad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang / blar
183b7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / namatha' nga mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su yi rang bas rje su yi rang ngo // ji ltar 'das pa dang
183b8(mdo sde): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa zung du 'brel pa la chags par spyar
184a1(mdo sde): shin tu spyad pa spyod pa rab tu mkhyen nas/ mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du mdzad ras/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dag la tre su yi rang ba dang / rje su yi rang ba
184a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / rje su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid de dang chos nyid des rjesu slob pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang rje su yi // rje su yi rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / na mkha'
184a3(mdo sde): ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi cho sadang ldan pa dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rdza su yi rababs rje
184a4(mdo sde): yi rang po zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'dini sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i rje su yi rang ba'i phung phe kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhar yang bang
184a5(mdo sde): rab sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig / na gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis shing / grangs ma mchis
184a6(mdo sde): pa rnamasu bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad ma dmigs nas/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa/  du srid pa'i
184a7(mdo sde): chos sbyor ma mchis pa brnyes pa/ yi ge dang / brjod pa dang / skad thams cad dang bral ba/ chos ji lta ba bzhin dubu rnyes pa/ thabs mkhas pas chos gzung bar mdzad pa'i slang/ ji tsam du brtags pa
184a8(mdo sde): sems can yonga.u smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos chungs gzan pa/ bskal ba'i sa la gzhes pa cang mi gsung ba la dgyes pa/ byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa/ lha dang klu dang
184b1(mdo sde): gnod spyir dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod de/ dgyes shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
184b2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i chos kyi 'khor
184b3(mdo sde): lo dang / mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol yongasu gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mi'i 'khor lo dang / bdud phyir rgol ba choms pa'i 'khor
184b4(mdo sde): lo bskor du gsol/ brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga brdung du gsol// sgra ma mchis pa'i dradu bung du gsol/ chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang me tog bsgreng du gsol/ shes rab dang / ye shes
184b5(mdo sde): dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol/ chos chen po 'i chu'i char pa'i rgyun gyis sems can rnams kyi dge
184b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog rnam par sbal du gsol/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi nor gyis sems can thang tshim par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
184b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshi go 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom
184b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum dpag tu ma mchis pa dag ra/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/ lags par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyar mi gcer pa
185a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin du lung bstan pa/ dge 'dun 'phags pa rab tu gnas pa/ gdul ba'i sems can dag shin tu gtul ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde
185a2(mdo sde): shin tu tshol ba/ chos gzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slar yongs su mi skyo ba/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dar bar bzheng po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag chas kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshu
185a3(mdo sde): gyis/ ji ltar de dag mi skye ba ma skyes pa de bzhin du// ma 'gags mi 'gag 'gag par mi 'gyur bar bzhugasu gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
185a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi gsol ba 'dobos pa yod pa ma yin pa/ len pa me dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di
185a5(mdo sde): skad ces ma mchis bzhin du bdag gi mgos phyag bgyis ba dang / bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang / phyag
185a6(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len pa mi mchis pa/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang / 
185a7(mdo sde): 'chags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len pa ma mchis pa/ lasu ma bgyis pa ste/ de bzhin du byang chub
185a8(mdo sde): kyang lem pa ma mchis pa/ 'du ma bgyim po ste/ chos yi dang / ma chang ba dang / ma lhag pa dang / ma smang ba dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi 'thob dang yi dpar ba'i yongs su sdongs na
185b1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/ gzugs kyang mig la ma
185b2(mdo sde): yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de yang mig las ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma yin te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med de mi
185b3(mdo sde): gnaso// de bzhin du rna ba la ma yin/ sgra la ma yin/ sA la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin te/ yid kyi chos rnams la mi 'jug
185b4(mdo sde): chos rnams kyang yid la mi 'jug mod kyi/ 'on kyang dpag sa pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ de yang yi nga las kyang ma byung / chos las kyang ma yin te/ de ni
185b5(mdo sde): byung nas zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsab byang chub la mi 'jug/ byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mong / 'on kyang byang chub kyi rkyen gyis dag
185b6(mdo sde): bo'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems bskrad pa rnams skye'o// de yang mi gnas pa ste/ skyes nas zhig cing me // de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'das byas pa dang / sems gang
185b7(mdo sde): gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos po'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan chun du 'brel bar mi byed de/ 'di lta snang dpe ma/ me ni gang ras kyang ma 'ongs te/ byungs kyang zhig cing mang po nga ba'i
185b8(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi mi yong gang nas kyang ma 'a ma longad kyi/ 'ongs nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la rgan 'ab sa byung ngasa'i gcing ma // ye shes sdang ba
186a1(mdo sde): thob pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa de lta bu dag la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba'o// skyon med par 'jug pa dang / lung
186a2(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par mi dpyod pa gang yin pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du byas te/ yongs su bsngo bar
186a3(mdo sde): bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo bar bshad pa
186a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes des yongs su bsngo'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngo ba khar ma tho ba med pa'o// 'jab dpal gzhod du
186a5(mdo sde): gyur pa phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa na/ byang chu ba sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chos thang la dam
186a6(mdo sde): 'cha' bar gnas pa yang mgu'o// lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa la mngor bar bstod do// 
186a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mang rdzogs s+ho// skad gas tshad kyis kyang tses nas gtad la rab pa// rgya ga ska
186a8(mdo sde): Ar+ya mra brdzun pa gipa 'i sring rgya po ma hA yAn pU / ba gang du/ 'phags pa spongs pani rnaMs kyis gus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen por mang / mas rgyas nga zung rgya mam
186b1(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na/ dge slong stong
186b2(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
186b3(mdo sde): nas chos ston to// de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba zhig tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam/ so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgyas yongasu bskor cing mdun du mdar ba dang / lhan cig tu
186b4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la de log su song ste phyin nas/ bcom
186b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bco ma ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yo ga 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ da nas
186b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yos pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
186b7(mdo sde): la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog/ khams gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi ldam
186b8(mdo sde): ba'i bzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/ kun tu khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs thugs pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags la/ bcom ldan
187a1(mdo sde): 'das ma mchis pa'i su snyigs ma'i rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa la dugu gsum 'bar la/ gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi rangar
187a2(mdo sde): gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na/ gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi yang ma lags pa dang rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis gnor
187a3(mdo sde): na tshur mi 'thur zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang / de dag gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa na/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang / de las gzhan pa
187a4(mdo sde): yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi mi yang mi mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing ra
187a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i tshul 'thob pa dang / de dag kyang phyi rol gyi gos ngur sI ga tsam dang / khong bu'i nang gi 'ang nu pa dang / zhe sdang dang / shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi 'thun la/ gcig la gcigs
187a6(mdo sde): de 'debs par bgyid pa dang / skyor sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / yom ngan nges par sred par 'gying pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas ra cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par bgyid
187a7(mdo sde): dang de dag shi 'khos na yang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnas pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal pa dang/ tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzang ba/ rtsub pa/ tshab
187a8(mdo sde): yid du mi mchi ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das nga'i slad du/ sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam nas rnam par bzlog nas/ bsod dang
187b1(mdo sde): kyi gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpor spobs pa'i blo gos la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// slobs pa'i blo gros de ltar
187b2(mdo sde): khong seng ga'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing / de ltar sems cad tha dade bzhin gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba snyed pa lagaso legaso// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob
187b3(mdo sde): nas/ legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs zhing / don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur pa'i chos de dag khong zhus shig/ sa ras pa
187b4(mdo sde): chom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gang dag ges ni/ lnga rnams ris sa skye bar 'gyur/ gang ba
187b5(mdo sde): gis mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis sems tsa dmyal ba rnams skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni drang 'gro/ mas skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ri yi dgas rnams su
187b6(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gos ri rigs mthon po rnamasu skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis bran dang bran mo rnams skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ra mi rnams kyi nang ngas mams pa rna
187b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing / zhim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri mnga' ba dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / mthong mngaga' ba dang / gnong ba ma mchis pa dang / lus rang sems shin tu tha mal dgaras pa
187b8(mdo sde): dang skye bo mang dpos bsngags pa rnam su 'gyur/ las gang dag pagis ri sems cad rnams mi'i nges pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba y-i
188a1(mdo sde): pa dang / kha dri mi bda' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang / nyes byas kyi las thams cang bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
188a2(mdo sde): 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba/ ngag sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin da rnams/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i sku
188a3(mdo sde): ba thams cad du/ rgyun te sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag la chos thos ras yid dag
188a4(mdo sde): zhing ci bsams pa bzhir du ngor yang 'grub par 'gyur/ bad ga gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na/ 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan
188a5(mdo sde): 'das gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i gshes gnyer mdzadapa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dbang dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i spyar dang ldan pas/ rnam par phye ste
188a6(mdo sde): rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spongs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ci ltar zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam par phye ste bshad kyis
188a7(mdo sde): shor cig/ tshong dpar spangs pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin dur tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 
188a8(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros sems cad las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ri/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongasu
188b1(mdo sde): skyong bar byed cing / bzang po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par mi byed cing / bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongasu gtong bar byed pa yid/ gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod pa
188b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang yongasu dag pa yin te/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin/ gso sbyong la brtson zhing bden pa smra ba yir/ rang bzhir du 'dug cing rang gi skyon chang med pa spong bar bang lo myos
188b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te/ las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal lo/ sra
188b4(mdo sde): chags gsod las ldog pa byas pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin rnams// 'jig rten du ni mo thub lus tsa mtshe ring nang me nga 'gyur ba yin// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can
188b5(mdo sde): shis ldan dri meng rdzogs pa'i lus// lha nang rab mchog da'i longs spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung / sor ma thag/ tu lnga rang rtag tu lha'i dbang phyug rnamasu 'gyur// bsam
188b6(mdo sde): meng bsngal ba 'phrog pa rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan// rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dgar dpal ldar gzhal med khang gnas shing / rtse zhing dge ba'i dpag bsams shing gi yul
188b7(mdo sde): rame tog gtor lus ldan// mkhas shing 'dra pa yi phan yongs spangs drim chog dag pa'i lus dang ldan// tshe rabs kun tu dpa meng gser mchog lus dang zhing rab tu mdzel// rdug tu lha yi nang dbaskal
188b8(mdo sde): pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung 'gyur// lA mo sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dojo pa'i dpal la spyod par byed// sngon chang tshogs bzhin 'dug skyon bzhi spangs kha ri ri'im lda
189a1(mdo sde): zhing thogs med mi 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams 'dir ni nges par 'byung // yang dag lan 'debs rnam sgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig gzung 'as// pi
189a2(mdo sde): 'byor sprin snyan po brang 'khor skang ldan// ma rmongs sems kyis myos 'gyur ma legs rjod byed spangs pas lngar 'gyur zhing / grags med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas ra gnas par 'gyur/ 
189a3(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa brjod par byed// gal te ma zad lnga yul nas ltung ba yi lha rnams de tshe slang
189a4(mdo sde): sdig med lo brgya nyi shu 'gro na lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ bsod nams lnga mngor gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus can// lha rnams las sel byed cing lha rnams byed cing lha rnams
189a5(mdo sde): bye ba mchod de brtan par 'gro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams/ mi
189a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byas pa gzo bas byin pa dang / bkren pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal ba la kun 'ged pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mnyam
189a7(mdo sde): par bsten pa dang / sems can thang la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos la spro bar byed cing / nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang
189a8(mdo sde): bcas la/ 'thun par 'dzin pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur zhing / longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring ba dang
189b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rje dpon dur gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa de dag bka' stsal to// sbyin pa byin pas mi yi rgyal po dam pa
189b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lus ngan po dang mtshungs par sbyid dang spyod par byed// rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshul khrims ma nyams
189b3(mdo sde): ni dkon mchog mchod par byed// nyes byas yongasu spangs pas shin tu nges pa ste// tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho meng pa yin// bde ba thob pas skyon meng rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa'i mi
189b4(mdo sde): pha rol sems 'khrugs mi byas shing / gzhan dag rnams kyis gdod byas phyir ri gnong mi byed/ de bzhin tshig ngan brjo dkyang gshe bar mi byed pas// dge ba'i mchog gi tshul
189b5(mdo sde): thob nas ni mdzes par 'gyur// brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing // stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan// dpag dpor nyid kyi
189b6(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur pas na// longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lha der 'gyur// mi 'phrogs sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu 'thun pa ste/ byas pa bzo zhing las la 'dod par rab tu byed/ 
189b7(mdo sde): dkor po chog gsung dang ma la sogs la mchod 'dzangs pa// na yang kun la the cang byed par mi 'gyur ro// mig gang khyad par 'phags pa dag pa lnga po rnams// byed pa de ni sa'i bdag por rag
189b8(mdo sde): 'gyur pa stobs la sogs dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan// grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rna las kyi rim gro byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bca
190a1(mdo sde): stsal par spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnang su skye bar 'gyur zhing // sdes ras kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba mang por
190a2(mdo sde): gnas par gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'du nga kor mchog la dad par mi byed la/ kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa rjo pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing // 'phags
190a3(mdo sde): pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang / bar gyi dus na yang dge slong dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyed po gang zag bzhi po mang por mi gus
190a4(mdo sde): pa/ 'thun par mi mdzin pa 'jig rten gyi sla ba lhur len pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa/ gcig la gcig nye sa rtsom gyis/ gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs pa'i
190a5(mdo sde): tshig gis/ rgyal po dang / rje por dang / blon po dang / dang bu rnams gcig la gcig mi 'thun pas/ mi gus pa rnam sa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sun dge slong rnams de bzhin
190a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la bsten nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ bdag nyid
190a7(mdo sde): dge slong yin par khas mche zhing / dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing / bkar blo mi bde ba la/ 'thun par mi 'dzin
190a8(mdo sde): cing / yang dag par rjesu bstan kyang rje su bstan pa la sgrub par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed la/ bdag la stong par byed/ gzhan la smad par byed cing / nga rgyal dang // rgyag
190b1(mdo sde): ba dang / dregs pa'i shas che la/ bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing / skur pa 'debs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de
190b2(mdo sde): ngag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnam su skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas kyang ji srid du skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa ma byung ba de srid duganas
190b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing / 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe der yang 'dzin pa byung bar gyur na/ de
190b4(mdo sde): tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang ga yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs meng ba dag ra/ ser dumal
190b5(mdo sde): ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyam zhing / sdug bsngal 'am su myong la 'byung ba'i mtha' yang // de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcang pa 'di dag bkar stsal
190b6(mdo sde): rmongs pas thogs ma mnganas 'jig pa'i sdug bsngang byir gyur pa'i// 'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho khas len ma byed de/ de ni kun rig ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes bdag
190b7(mdo sde): nyid chung gzar skye bo'i gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor ba sdug pa'i mchog byas na// dag pa chung ngu 'gyur zhing 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhes
190b8(mdo sde): ming ga 'dzini ma ngos sum dge ba mdun na yong bzhin du// 'on kyang sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun du sbyong bar byang / bar marjod pa'i dusu 'di ba'i ngo bkres pas nyam thag pa/ phang dum khor du
191a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pas dkrugs shing bla ma slong bar byed// 'khor du 'angs pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di rin ma shigs pas/ mi bzang ro meng log par ltung ba'i sar ri 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
191a2(mdo sde): rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang gzhon du bu mo rnams/ byams pa'i yid ni log 'gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te/ byis pa bu rnams thams cad gcig la gcig ni gzhang gang byed// leg
191a3(mdo sde): ltung dam pa rnam par 'bang bar mA rang 'gro bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus 'di ru gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams// 'thun par mi 'dzin dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug/ ngan pa'i
191a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba// de dgashi 'phos nas ni sdig pa rtsod pa'i mchog gis gnod// mi yis bskal pa brgya phrag mang per sdig pa lnga po dag
191a5(mdo sde): bsgrubs shing byas pa dag ni bshags par nus pa ma yin te/ gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis kyang bsgrub par mi spyod pa'i// me ri drag po lar med pa yi re re re sreg par
191a6(mdo sde): 'gyuras de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gos sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dung 'gro rnam su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga ganga'i
191a7(mdo sde): radang po 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / chom rkun dang gzhan gyi bu lor blangs ras/ gnod semasu byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma dad pasangs pa'i chos ma yir ba nyan par dga' zhing / dam
191a8(mdo sde): pa'i chos ma yin pa nyang pa la dga' bas/ log pas 'tsho ba zang la dga' ba ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ri dung 'gro rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas
191b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su gcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la dga' ba'i mi rnams ni// bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed/ sreg
191b2(mdo sde): gcod pa la dga' ba'i ri dgas 'chi bdag rgyal po rnams// rgya la sogs pas bzung nas sems can rnams la gsod par byed// dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar po'i 'du shes can// rag
191b3(mdo sde): po'i dpag tu med pa bdag cag sbyong ba mi shes pa/ rmongs pa rnams ring ba chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed// 'jig rten zhugs pa'i chos la 'dir ni rje su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar gang
191b4(mdo sde): las ri ngal ba bab dang rab bab po// chu yi chu yi shugs kyis 'phral dus 'og 'gro ba bzhid// lha mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po mang du byas pas na// rmongs pa rnabs ni de bzhin dung 'gro
191b5(mdo sde): rnamasu myur du 'gro// rnga dre'u rnga bong glang chen ba lang pa ha sang ge dang / wa dang sbrul dang phag dang khyim la sogs par gyur na su/ rdza za ba dang sha dang bdud zi lo ma'i zas za 'ang
191b6(mdo sde): dag rtag tu gzhir gyi khur ler byed cing dbu par 'gyur// bkres pas zil gyis gnod pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa/ bskal pa khrag khrig rngams su'angang pa yang thar par mi 'gyur zhing // ci
191b7(mdo sde): lngar rgya mcho gcig maru sAl mig ni gcig yod pas// gza' shing bu gar 'grer ba gtad par mi nus pa/ de bzhir lha dang mi dang dbang phyug che nyid bde blag tu// log par ltung ba brgya yis thob pa
191b8(mdo sde): nus pa ma yin te/ sangs rgyas 'od zer dam pa tshogs can dpag tu med pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' kha mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par 'gyur// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
192a1(mdo sde): blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnapas ri// yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ dang po bkre 'i pa
192a2(mdo sde): pa dang / mun pa mu nag chen po'i gshes gnyen dang / stsogs pa lhung byed pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir drag dog dang / ser sA lU
192a3(mdo sde): pas spun dang / sring mo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / zho shis 'tsho ba dang / mdzar bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'brel pa dang / sbyin gnas dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze da
192a4(mdo sde): bkren pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing / pha ma dag la yang rab tu sbyin par mi byed pa dang / nges par bskyang bar 'os pa dag mi stong la bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / bla ma la mi gus
192a5(mdo sde): la gces par mi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni yi dwags rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// dengs bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
192a6(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa/ de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed/ mdzod rnams kyi'i sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa
192a7(mdo sde): rnams pa 'dir ni bskyang 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gso mi byed// gzhan nor chung gson pa yis rtag tu skrag pa rnams// bla ma la yang de dag rab rtsub byams can min// de dag bdag gi chung ma
192a8(mdo sde): la sogs g.yog tshogs la/ dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying brtse shes med cing // dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi
192b1(mdo sde): dgas 'gyur// de dag lo brgya rnamasu rmi lam rmi bar yang // gos dang / zas dang / btung ba'ang nam yang rmi mi 'gyur// khab 'dra'i kha ngang ri chen lta bu'i lto can rnams// nyams thag shar dang
192b2(mdo sde): nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed // kha nas me 'bar lus ngan phyogs dang lho phyogs gzhan// skams par mthong nas rin chen med rnams ltung bar 'gyur// gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub
192b3(mdo sde): sdug cing // sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zangs bzhud bzod dga' ba rab/ me 'drar bro med pa de dag rnams la ldung // rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad lngar chu bzhin 'thung bar byed// nang grol
192b4(mdo sde): lus kyi khong pa bsregs pa bsal ba'i rlung gisu// skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen yang ldung byed// de nas shi 'phos mi'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams/ rigs
192b5(mdo sde): longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyuraro// de na sa bcom ldan las kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la ba/ 'astsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gas sems can las lnga
192b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnam su 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis 'jig rten thad la gnod sems med par gyur pa dang / dkor mchog gsum dang / pha ma la
192b7(mdo sde): gus pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klag pa dang / kha thon du bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gra
192b8(mdo sde): sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rigs 'thon po rnams su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsam byas ga
193a1(mdo sde): bsod nams tshogs pa skal bzang sbyin pa'i cho gu bzhin/ kun tu sems can mngal kun bged de dag rtag tu na med 'gyur// tshe dang la dog stobs ldan lus cam
193a2(mdo sde): rten mchog tu 'gyur/ mtshungs dang skye chem khyad par can gyis mdzes brjod ri chen ji rang bzhin/ 'dul ba nyams dga' na mchog ma tshungs med pha ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bas// shi
193a3(mdo sde): tu rgya can gtso mchog khyim du skyes bu grangs med skye bo mchog/ shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrag rnam spangs kun tu gzugs kyis 'phags pa rnams// 'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa
193a4(mdo sde): bskal bzang rigs ni mthon por 'gyur// gang dag bstan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang 'thun rnams dang / mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsu
193a5(mdo sde): la kha don brtson// de dag 'byor pa thab nas rigs mchog ste sa ba kun mchog mdzes// de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus na rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du su// de nas bcom ldan 'a
193a6(mdo sde): kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gos sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha
193a7(mdo sde): ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / gya nom pa'i sems ma yin pa dang / zlog pa med cing ci dgang sdig pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / bu lon phrogs nas bdag sbeng pa ste/ spobs
193a8(mdo sde): bi'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod
193b1(mdo sde): nams rgya chen 'byor pa gang 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas/ blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par mi byed la// pha ma rnams la rmad byung sbyin gnas 'dra bar 'du
193b2(mdo sde): shes mi byed pas// de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur dman zhing g.yor can 'gyur// dkon mchog tshungs med rnams la ma gus lhung byed ma rungs brlang tshig 'gyur// gang dag byams
193b3(mdo sde): rang de bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chung gsan pa/ de dag grangs ming skye bar 'dzim med gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes shing // mi yi yul du sprin nyid spangs nas skad cig gis rang pa' bar 'gyur / 
193b4(mdo sde): gzugs dang dbang phyug rigs mchog blo bral dpan la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur// dkon mchog rnams ni mchod pas nga rgya la med cing zhan la yang sa ngar 'gyur// dpal kA
193b5(mdo sde): cing ting 'dzin bral ba las rnams kyis ni bsdigs par ra gyur// de dag 'jig rten kun dga' dga' ston che stsogs me da cing tshegs kyis 'tsho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
193b6(mdo sde): yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ri skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang kha dri zhim pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang
193b7(mdo sde): lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnangasu 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'du shes ci lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshang ba meng pa
193b8(mdo sde): sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhi la mi bzod pa mang cing pa spang la
194a1(mdo sde): zhing de thams cad gzung bdang / bshad pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ngos pa sogs pa byed pa dang / dag sa spyong pa'i blo tshang med pa rnas par spyong zhing/ 'phags pa'i la
194a2(mdo sde): skur ba mi 'debs pa dang / sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing / yongasu bskang ba dang / skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gyi sgor mthong
194a3(mdo sde): de'i brjod pa yal bar 'jog pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du sdes ras/ skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim 'al dang ldan
194a4(mdo sde): pa dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / 'thun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / sems tha mal du gnas pa dang / khro ba med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 
194a5(mdo sde): kha dog dang ldan pa dang / grags pa dang ldan pa rnamasu 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sogs la shin tu
194a6(mdo sde): shas cher gus 'bad pa la rnams mchod pas// rtag tu dag skyon kun bral 'dzag rten dag tu rmad dur byung bar 'gyur// tshig gi yon tan gzung 'os rnga skar bcas shing tshe rabs kun tu par/ ud
194a7(mdo sde): pal dri ngang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan la yis phyogs su snyan por grags/ gang dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs mi phan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las/ phral nas dge ba kun la sems can
194a8(mdo sde): rnams ni sbyor dur 'jug byed pa/ de dag mi yi 'jig rten thob nas skal bzang kun tu thams cad dga'// shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las log par 'gyur// dpa pa'i
194b1(mdo sde): ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed cing nges par 'gyur// 'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldar 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyis rma lag tshogs
194b2(mdo sde): gyur ces// de ltar zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni phan par byed// 'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sur 'byin pa'i// sdig pa yongasu spangs nas dag pa'i
194b3(mdo sde): yid can skyon rnams kun sbas nas// sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs pan tshun brjod par byed// myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs med thob ras sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur
194b4(mdo sde): de res bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs la'i blo gros la ba ka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga ngang ldan pa rnams ri ri'i dam pa thob nas/ rtag tu rtsu
194b5(mdo sde): pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gdang pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa la yin par 'gyu
194b6(mdo sde): te lnga gang zhe na/ brdzun du smra ba dang // rdzun tu slu bas rtag tu gzhan bslu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang / chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po la 'dus pa na/ chos kyi ga sa nge pa
194b7(mdo sde): par smod pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spong ba rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang / dpa' ba'i semasu byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga par dag
194b8(mdo sde): pa rna pas ri mi'i dam pa thob ras rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog yi sdug pa dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnong
195a1(mdo sde): mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshig su bcang pa 'di dag bka' stsal to sems yid rnams kyis
195a2(mdo sde): gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas// log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang // lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa
195a3(mdo sde): med nas su myong bar 'gyur/ lcags kyi lcag kyu chen po rdor po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur// gshin rje'i dbang phyug gar sul lernams shin du zangs bkrol ldang bar 'a
195a4(mdo sde): dmyal bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yong mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar kha dri ma zhom zhing / 'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong ba lnga sdug pa yid na
195a5(mdo sde): su 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'ang bas rtsod pa'i spyod mang zhing // de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi nis yang mang pos gleng bar 'gyur// sems can bar
195a6(mdo sde): sma rnams kyis tha mal sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir// sngar bshad nyes 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur// mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun
195a7(mdo sde): la sku byed pa'i// sems car dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'angs gyur nas ni// 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dung 'gro rnamasu skye// de ltar lus can 'khya
195a8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par gyur pa med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
195b1(mdo sde): mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thang du rtag par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang phrang ba thob par
195b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnabs thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod
195b3(mdo sde): pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song nas/ gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba
195b4(mdo sde): sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa 'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed 'jug pa dang
195b5(mdo sde): mkhan po dang / slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang bka' blo bde ba dang / 'thun par 'dzin par sgrub pa dang / kun tu thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems
195b6(mdo sde): can thang bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ci ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang / klog pa dang / kha thon dang / lung mdod pa dang / bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa
195b7(mdo sde): yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par bsgom pa la mngon par zher cing bsgrub par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma bar
195b8(mdo sde): ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye bo'i skye ba de dang de thad du/ bar chad med par sa sa rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mchog rnams
196a1(mdo sde): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhi
196a2(mdo sde): du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i ma tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag
196a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi chos la gnas// de dag nyid kyis sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzugs legs
196a4(mdo sde): legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur// mkhas ni slob dpon che gas la mchod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'a jig rten ma lus la// bdag dang bu gcig byis pa
196a5(mdo sde): rnams dang 'drar mthong ba// de dag srid pa kun tu mya ngan re dngos 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // gang dag shes ra rir
196a6(mdo sde): chen po 'byor mdzad rnams// nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed// 'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams// 'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog byed 'gyur// 
196a7(mdo sde): kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas// sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par// nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgya ni shis par
196a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// de nas tshong dpor spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid ras nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thos
196b1(mdo sde): ngo tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang / so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya tsham po de dag ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dris dang bral ba thob pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khar gyi
196b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par 'gyur ba dngag
196b3(mdo sde): kyis ni/ ci bsam pa bzhin gyi theg pa rnams la sems snyed do// ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang thob cing ma tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa/ dpag tu
196b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas tsheng dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa ga cig tu bzang ras/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
196b5(mdo sde): gzugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sgra rab btung ras/ 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das pa mas gsum pa'i bla ma chos lnga po 'di dag legs pa
196b6(mdo sde): gsungs pa la gso leg so// chos lnga po de dag thos nas/ 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par dor grub par gyur lag so// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos ras rag
196b7(mdo sde): phyogs spangs te/ dbang po'i phyogs la zhugs shing dartul zhugs grub par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par spyar 'dram
196b8(mdo sde): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i sladaru/ khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshong dpar spobs pa'i blo gros la thugs brtse ba'i slad garang bar mdzad do// dam
197a1(mdo sde): dpor spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing bgu ste/ yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes ras/ ba
197a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de rang gi
197a3(mdo sde): khying song nas/ pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te/ thal mo lcug lhug por sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smra so// yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa de bzhin gshegs pa bla ra re
197a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la sbyar dras
197a5(mdo sde): na des kyang bdag cag la thugs brje ba'i slang/ gnang lags kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis pha ma dag yid dga' ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ 
197a6(mdo sde): bu leg so// khyed kyis legs par byaso zhes mngon par stong nga / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spo bar gyur to// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi chung ma ngas pa g.yog
197a7(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba/ bzang mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i dor du/ bza' ba dang
197a8(mdo sde): btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa mang ba dang / bsod par sbyor cig/ sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad tshag chag gdab pa dang / phyag dang bya ba dang / bla re bre ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang / me tog
197b1(mdo sde): chal bar bgram pa dang / bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs par byed chug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig pa'i gdan ci 'osu thing ste/ mchod yor dang 'bas
197b2(mdo sde): la dbul ba spyar ngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdong cig ces bsgo te/ spobs pa'i blo gros mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang nye du nga / rgan rabs la sogs pa dang lhan cig
197b3(mdo sde): 'grogs shing ci skad smras pa thams cad bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan po las ras/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bsred res tshal
197b4(mdo sde): po nas/ sems can na res la thugs brtsebs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phral gyi dpal rnam par 'phruphral pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas/ cho 'phral dang bcas par mnyan du yang
197b5(mdo sde): pa'i grong khyer chen por gsheg so// gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khi ba ga la bde log su bzhung ngo // de ras spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog la
197b6(mdo sde): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu ras/ mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'ab ring bdang bcas par
197b7(mdo sde): khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das ri tsi 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhug so// dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'os pa la 'khod ngo // de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / slas
197b8(mdo sde): rang mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nyi dung / rgan rabs rnams ni yang dga' 'dudu la/ zla ba la gus pa dang / gnyis par byed pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi sa 'dun
198a1(mdo sde): gcig pa la 'drim par rtsom/ spongs pa'i blo gros ni/ me dog dang / spos chur bcas pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas/ ston pa'i spyar sngar 'ongagu par gyur / yang de'i tshe
198a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba'i grogs pa gnyis shig/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur ras/ de gnyis las gcig ni dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugaso// de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba da
198a3(mdo sde): btung ba 'byor tshogs shes la smras la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rje su thugs rangab ma gsungs pas// de gang gis kyang dri yang po byem ngas/ de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug
198a4(mdo sde): bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci yang ma byin pa ni/ dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/ sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing / snying rje me de la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin pa dag go// gang de dag
198a5(mdo sde): la byin yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin pa dag blun pa ste/ gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ thams cad kyi lcags kyi 'khor los ga ngo snyam du sems
198a6(mdo sde): par gyur ro//  nas de'i 'og tu dag slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / bca' bdag 'bya'i tshogs shes byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rje su thugs rang bar mdzad pa dang / gcig shos sa
198a7(mdo sde): par gyur to// de nas ri bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa thob nas/ de yi rangs te/ phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis bza' ba dang / btung ba yang dang
198a8(mdo sde): bsod pa byin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te/ snying brtse bar byed la sems se bar zhi ba yin nang byams pa'i bdag rid can dge go// 'dis ni bdag zhig bdun du tshim parar gyur par ba'o// gang 'di
198b1(mdo sde): ngag la byin na/ 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste leg so// gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
198b2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la zhig bdun du/ bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rim gror byed par gyur cig snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/ gsung sder gyu ste phyag
198b3(mdo sde): bcabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dang phyin cang bza' ba dang / btung ba ma blangs pa da du rje su yi ring ba brjod cig/ de ras spobs pa'i blo gros g.ya
198b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par gzeng bstong pa dang / yang dag par 'ji tu gzhug
198b5(mdo sde): pa sngon du byed pa'i chos kyi gtab sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad de// gdan la sa bzhengs nas bzhud de/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi cha'ang
198b6(mdo sde): gshegs nas/ der bzhug so// de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyam 'khyam ste/ yul gzhan zhig tu song ras pa zad chu zad tsam gyi phyogasu nyal bar gyur to// der bsod nams
198b7(mdo sde): kyi las can de la steng gi ra mkha' lo grib ma'i don tu/ sprin gyi bla re klog dang ldan rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe yul der rgyal po gang yin pa de'ichi ba'i dus byas
198b8(mdo sde): der gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gan ni meng ngo // dem tshong dpon dang grong mi dang / yul mi dang / blor po cher po dang / blong po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor bar
199a1(mdo sde): 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang / skar ma dang / gza' spyod pa la mkhas pa la/ rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brjor par gyur ci
199a2(mdo sde): 'dri'o// des smras pa/ skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod// de ni rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa ring thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po
199a3(mdo sde): gser gyi rkang rjer rang bcas pa dang / yu ba nor bu las byas pa'i gdagus dkar po dang / yu ba gser las byas shing / nor bu ldan pa'i rdza ma'i bsil yab dang / spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa
199a4(mdo sde): dumya dang / me tog dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / gos dang / dbu rgyan dang thong dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyar dang / spos kyi phur ma dang / slom dam thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rjo
199a5(mdo sde): pa dang / gla dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang / rgyal po'i pho bra nga 'khor nas byung ste/ kun ras de kun tu btsal to// ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i phyogs de mthong
199a6(mdo sde): ste mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khengs pa dga' zhing gsal ba'i phyogs mthong ngam/ de dag gis smras pa/ grags pa mthong
199a7(mdo sde): ngo rangs smras pa/ de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi las kyi grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so// de nas de dag dong nas/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgras
199a8(mdo sde): sbran te/ btung nas de la 'di skad ces smras so// dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig/ des smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ bsod rams kyi las
199b1(mdo sde): can khyod de skad ma zer bar/ khong gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dges so// smras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas de dag gi gser gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de skar bzang po la 'dugu du bcug nas
199b2(mdo sde): bkris thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing // dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan dar thid can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ shing rta'i mgo log su gdugus chen po bsgreng ste/ btsugs shing
199b3(mdo sde): yu ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsol yab dag gis g.yob cing / lha rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces/ kun nas mngon par bstod nga rgyal po'i pho brang 'kho
199b4(mdo sde): du khring ngo // de nas rgyal po'i shing / de bsgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gcing log pa'i mgo tshang ngo // de nas bsod nams kyi las can de yang rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to// 
199b5(mdo sde): rgyal srid yang yams kyi nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo leg sa pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang bar gyur to// rgyal
199b6(mdo sde): po'i ming gi yon tan thams cad 'bor cing ldan par gyur la/ dga' mgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du/ 'di gang gis mthu yin/ bdag gis rgyal srid bskal pa bzang po dang ldan pa 'di gang gis
199b7(mdo sde): byung bar gyur snyam pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las mngon par 'du byas pa de thams cad rje su dran na/ yang dag par dran nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du/ bcom ldan
199b8(mdo sde): bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs rtsa ba'i slang du tshur gsheg su gsol zhes pho nya zhig bang // pho la btang nas kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang /  gi
200a1(mdo sde): bar deng / bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag bdab cing phyag dngabyas te/ me tog chal par bkram nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal ma ra dang / kha dang
200a2(mdo sde): drababs bcugs shing pog spong dag gis bdugs nas/ mngon par brgya ma / bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slar gshegs so// de ras rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang / yul gyi
200a3(mdo sde): me dang bcas shing blon po chen po dang / blo po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la me tog dang / spos dang / me dog 'phreng dang / 
200a4(mdo sde): byug pa dang / phye mas bsgos pa'i bla ma dpag tu med pas mchod de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la lus thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ras/ 'khar dang bcas te ba
200a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par byed pa che na po mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'du nadang thabs gcig tu rang gi khyim gyi rang rin po che thams cad
200a6(mdo sde): kyis brgyad pa skyed mos tshal chen pos yongs su bskor bar gshegasu gsol nas/ zhag bdun dbung ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya so// de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod
200a7(mdo sde): gsol nas/ ljang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir g.yog 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan
200a8(mdo sde): 'das bdag ni dma' ba dang dbul ba lags na/ bdag gi rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa 'dig las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mnya du yod pa'i grong
200b1(mdo sde): khyer chen po na/ sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba zhig yod de// des dus gzhan zhig na/ rang gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to/ 
200b2(mdo sde): de nas der sdug bsngal ba gnyis shig lpags shes bya ba nas/ rgyas par snga ma bzhin te/ gcig gi mgo khyod kyi shing rta'i 'khor los chod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de yang shi 'phongs nas sa
200b3(mdo sde): dpral bar skyes pa de'i mgo skang cig skad cig la skyeso tsag na/ lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar bas bcang ngo // de yang de nas bskal pa bye bas thar par 'gyuraro// khyod kyis ri rgyal po'i dpal thob ste
200b4(mdo sde): bdag de lta bur gyur nas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du/ gdugs tshod gsol bar gyur cig ces khyod kyis smon lam btab ste/ khyod kyi bsam pa de yang
200b5(mdo sde): rdzogs so// de phyin cang ni tshe rabs dpag tu med pa thams cad du phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa da ga 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
200b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rten dag po 'byung ba'i phyir// yid ni dug gi rtsa ba yin// nyes par smra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir// kha ni sdig pa'i sgo nyid do// sems
200b7(mdo sde): kyis sna tshogs sems par byed// de nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur// ngag yang dag gis sdig byas pa// lus skyes sdug bsngal sbyin par byed// phan dang mi par ma bsams par// blo gros med
200b8(mdo sde): pas sdig byed pa// des nas sdug bsngal snod gyur te/ na mangs pa dag de ltar 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams kyi mgo bo dag yid kyis gcod par 'dong ba de// blo gros ngan pa mi shes pa'i/ 
201a1(mdo sde): mgo ni 'khor los yang dag tshod// dpal ldan yid 'di kho nas ni// chos dkar bdud rtsi rten pa yi// sems can bsod nams byas dge rnams// lha'i 'jig
201a2(mdo sde): rten rnamasu khridang // 'dir ni snying gis kun bsams nas// tshig tu rjod pas legs smras pa// de phyir de ni lus kyis su// bsod nams mdzod ni len par 'gyur// mi yis blo ni sngar
201a3(mdo sde): btang ste// las ngag rnams phye nas// gal te bsod nams che byed na// rtag tu rab tu lha der 'gyur// sems kyis mi dag pa'i las// rtag tu yongs su spangs ras ni// rab tu dga' bas
201a4(mdo sde): bsod nams nyid// mi yis byas te sdig pa min// tshe rabs bye ba grangs med par// 'khor los sgyur sogs go 'phang gi/ lha mi'i nang du rgyal po'i dpal// thams cad thob nas
201a5(mdo sde): khyod bzhin no// mi'i dbang phyug dus kun tu/ srid rnams sI nga po med shes nas// khyod kyis sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ mngon par brtson pa mtha' yas bya// de
201a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das las rgyal po des yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa thos nas/ mchog tu yid byung ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gnan
201a7(mdo sde): stong mang po zhig gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pas lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur pa dang / thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i
201a8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der gang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa de thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/ gtsug
201b1(mdo sde): lag khang gi skyabs shin du dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan ba shams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod
201b2(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu sngor cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag
201b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byang ba thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa las ci ltar smon lam btang
201b4(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa rnams la lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos
201b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ci ltar gzung bar gyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ las rnam
201b6(mdo sde): par 'byed pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ tshong dpon spongs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ras/ tshe dang ldan pa
201b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gos g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lnga
201b8(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par stod do// 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba
202a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po brang lta bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bar de ye shes snre la sogs pas
202a2(mdo sde): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgyu gaskang du/ brah+ma dz+wa la sU tra/ bod skad du/ tshangs pI ba'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
202a3(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / dge bsnyen stong dang / slongs mo pa lnga brgya rnams dang / thabs gcig tu yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs
202a4(mdo sde): rgyu zhing gshegs pa gshegs pa las/ mtshan mo rgyal po'i khab dang s+ya sngar can gyi grong gyi bar de na/ 'od ma'i lcug phrar rgyal po 'i gnas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu
202a5(mdo sde): bzhug so// de'i tshe kun tu rgyur ba dga'/ rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa brjod la/ chos dang ge 'dun la yang mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / kun tu
202a6(mdo sde): rab dga'i slob ma bram ze'i bu tshangs byin zhes bya ba ni/ rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas la snyan pa brjod la/ chos dang / dge 'dun la snar par brjod pa zhig ste/ de ltar slob dpon dang sra
202a7(mdo sde): ma de gnyis phan tshun lta ba dang / mos pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / bzod pa dag gis mi 'thun par smra zhing / dge slong gi dge 'dun dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
202a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi bzhin na 'bring du rjong ngo // de nas dge slong mang po'i gnas na 'dusu shing 'khod pa rnams na re// tshe dang ldan pa dag sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs
202b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste kun tu rgyur ba dga'/ rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas la mi snyan brjod la/ chos dang dge 'ang nu la yang mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / kun tu rgyu rab dga'i slob ma bram ze'i bu
202b2(mdo sde): tshangs byin zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas la snyan pa rjod la/ chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa zhig ste/ de ltar slob dpon dang / slob ma de gnyis phan tshun lta ba
202b3(mdo sde): dang dmos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / bzod pa dag gis mi mthun par smra zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi
202b4(mdo sde): bzhin du zhwa 'bring du dong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rab tu che'o zhes skab sa kyi gtam de lta bu dag yang dag par brjod par gyur to// de nas dge slong mang po dag/ rgyal po'i gnas na 'das
202b5(mdo sde): shing 'khod pa rnams kyi skabs kyi btam dus la bab pa dgra/ bcom ldan 'das nyin mo'i gnas na bzhugs pa zhugs pa'i lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las
202b6(mdo sde): 'das pas gsan par gyur to// gsan nas kyang tinge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ rgyal po'i gnas ga la bder gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gangar bting
202b7(mdo sde): ba nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rgyal po'i gnasu dge slong mang po rnams 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi skabs kyi gangam
202b8(mdo sde): dus la bab pa ni gang yin/ khyed gtam gang gis nang ltar 'dusu shing 'khod / btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po rnams rgyal po'i gnas 'dir 'as shing mchis pa ni/ kun tu rgyur ba dag
203a1(mdo sde): rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa brjod la/ chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dga'i slo ma bram ze'i bu tshangs
203a2(mdo sde): sbyin zhes bgyi ba ni/ rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas la ma snyan pa brjod la/ chos dang / dge 'dun la yang ma snyan pa brjod pa zhig ste/ de ltar slob dpar dang / slob ma de gnyis par
203a3(mdo sde): tshun lta ba dang / mos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / bzod pa dag gis mthur par smra zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
